argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cnsubglem.1 | |- ( x e. A -> x e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | cnsubglem.2 | |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x + y ) e. A ) |
| 3 |  | cnsubglem.3 | |- ( x e. A -> -u x e. A ) |
| 4 |  | cnsubglem.4 | |- B e. A |
| 5 | 1 | #P_ssriv | |- A C_ CC |
| 6 | 4 | #P_ne0ii | |- A =/= (/) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( x e. A -> A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfldneg | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) = -u x ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( x e. A -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) = -u x ) |
| 10 | 9, 3 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( x e. A -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) e. A ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_jca | |- ( x e. A -> ( A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A /\ ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) e. A ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_rgen | |- A. x e. A ( A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A /\ ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) e. A ) |
| 13 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 14 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Grp ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_ax-mp | |- CCfld e. Grp |
| 16 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 17 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` CCfld ) = ( invg ` CCfld ) |
| 19 | 16, 17, 18 | #P_issubg2 | |- ( CCfld e. Grp -> ( A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) <-> ( A C_ CC /\ A =/= (/) /\ A. x e. A ( A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A /\ ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) e. A ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 15, 19 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) <-> ( A C_ CC /\ A =/= (/) /\ A. x e. A ( A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A /\ ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` x ) e. A ) ) ) |
| 21 | 5, 6, 12, 20 | #P_mpbir3an | |- A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
